generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Ocasio-Cortez: 'Trump himself is clearly not satisfied with only one article of impeachment'," you may expect an exploration of Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez's comments regarding former President Trump's stance on impeachment proceedings. Additionally, it might delve into Ocasio-Cortez's views on the need for broader accountability in government, reflecting her progressive stance.
